name: CHEEVO_SEEING_BLUE
displayName: Seeing Blue
description: In “Minotaur Town”, capture all 3 towns and defeat the Minotaur on the same turn.

displayName: Seeing Red
description: Complete “Minotaur Town” without capturing any Monoliths or the Monastery.

name: CHEEVO_SNEAK_ATTACK
displayName: Sneak Attack
description: In “Rough Going”, rescue Trillian then use her to defeat Scorpia.

name: CHEEVO_OVER_THE_BRIDGE
displayName: Over The Bridge
description: Complete “The Brass Chef” by capturing the town across the bridge before the other two towns.

description: Complete "The Wraith Portal" on the same turn that you capture the island town.
